metadata.title: CVE-2019-19949 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNGImage of coders/png.c, related to Magick_png_write_raw_profile and LocaleNCompare.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15').
